ISSUE.TITLE: [Releases] Going back from Content Manager to Content Releases doesn't work as expected
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ## Bug report ### Required System information Node.js version: 20.9.0 Strapi version: 5.0.0-beta.13 Operating system: Windows WSL and OS ### Describe the bug If I click the “Go to Content Manager” button in a release, the go back button doesn't work as expected, it is not redirecting me to the release page. ### Steps to reproduce the behavior 1. Go to Releases 2. Create a new release 3. Click on [Open the Content Manager] 4. From CM page, click Back arrow button ### Expected behavior Go back button should redirect me to my release page. ### Screenshots https://app.dashcam.io/replay/667589bebcbf70007514e420?share=wjlj2PxoYlWfcizWJ7F9ww
